name: BubbleBee
description:
There once was a bee who lived in the middle of nowhere. They may have lived in the middle of nowhere because they were a bit clumsy. Well, ok, extremely clumsy. Luckily for them, a most gracious turnip sprite has floated on by! 

Gameplay and Controls:

🐝 The bee will pick a flower they want. This will change their color to let you know which one.

🐝 You can walk, jump, hover, fly, and glide around the map. WASD and SPACEBAR

🐝 You can hold down LEFT CLICK to blow air. This will push bubbles.

🐝 You can hold down RIGHT CLICK to ready your bubble wand (no visual).

🐝 If you press both mouse buttons, you'll start making a bubble.

🐝 You can bounce off bubbles and mushrooms 🍄

🐝 Since the bee sucks at steering, you'll have to catch them in a bubble, and then blow that bubble around.

🐝 Once they get the flower they want, they'll buzz off back home

🐝Known issue: Sometimes the bee will get lost on their way home- it's very sad. 

🐝Known issue: Camera is poop sometimes

🐝Known issue: The whole bee is supposed to change color, not just his face...

Assets Used:

  • Cinemachine
  • DoTween
  • Clayxels
  • Amplify
